name: Food Rampage!
description:
Only Windows. FOR NOW!

Play with your friend/enemy or whatever in this EPIC VERSUS GAME. Who's gonna win and become part of a new smoothie? Fight For IT! JUST THROW FOOD AT HIM or other items!

Controls:

Player 1:
Move: W, A, S, D
Pick/Throw item: F

Player 1:Player 2Move: W, A, S, D
Pick/Throw: FMove: Up, Down, Left, Right
Pick/Throw: / or K

*Bugs may appear :|
*THANKS FOR PLAYING!
